title: Simple Barbecue Sauce
instructions: In a saucepan, thoroughly combine all the ingredients except the butter and bring them all to a boil.  Reduce the heat and let the sauce simmer for 5 minutes.  Finally, stir in the butter and stir until it is well incorporated.
remarks: You can use this sauce to baste meat with while barbecuing.  Also, serve it warm on the side with brisket. This sauce keeps for a week to 10 days in the refrigerator in an air-tight container. Yield:  Make 3 cups. Source:  Matt Martinez’s Culinary Frontier:  A Real Texas Cookbook, by Matt Martinez, Jr., and Steve Pate, published by Doubleday, 1540 Broadway, New York, N.Y. 10036, © 1997 by Matt Martinez, Jr., and Steve Pate.
